summary: An alcoholic man and his two young children barely survive in Taipei. They cross path with a lonely grocery clerk who might help them make a better life.
cast: Kang-sheng Lee|Kuei-Mei Yang|Yi-Ching Lu|Shiang-chyi Chen|Yi Cheng Lee|Yi Chieh Lee|Jin-kai Wu
director: Director: Ming-liang Tsai (as Tsai Ming Liang)
title: Jiao you
